#Text=Q :
#Text=Which council decision ( since the 2003 election ) do you feel the city/your ward should be most proud of , and which was least desirable ?
#Text=A :
#Text=A high point was when Council supported my Civic Youth Strategy .

#Text=They approved not only a strategy which demands meaningful employment and empowerment of Youth , but also a process to allow Youth themselves to determine the membership of our Toronto Youth Panel .
#Text=This panel will report to council as well as have council 's initiatives reported to them for direct input .
#Text=A low point was when Council turned down my motion to start an office of Civic Engagement attached to the City Manager 's office .
#Text=This is absolutely crucial to a more engaged , united and more equitable City .
#Text=Informal and upstart community groups need help , advice , access to resources , and networks — things we have to offer , but are n't equipped to share .
#Text=I will be bringing the concept back to a new term of Council .
#Text=Anderson Tung

#Text=33-year-old Anderson Tung is has served " as a University of Toronto Governor , consultant and advisor to city council , and unofficial lawyer that enforces laws on MP , MPPs , City council , and political parties .

column1: #Text=AND Freeze all unionized wages for next 10 years .
#Text=Upload 50 % of toronto police officers , resources , and budget to federal RCMP jurisdiction .
#Text=2 ) cut child poverty by 50 % this year in TO , by cancelling gardiner demolition and uploading 50 % police cost to feds .
#Text=3 ) Reform of justice system , and media so that it cannot be used as a weapon of terror by any public office .
#Text=4 ) Make environmental power generation , biodiesel , ethanol30 , and Recapitalize transportation projects and offer strategy for unified transit system in GTA .
#Text=5 ) Engage province to reopen Kirkland lake mine as enviro-friend waste disposal option for longterm
#Text=6 ) Raise property taxes or surcharges on Walmart , Costco , and other multinationals by 100 % or more , as permitted by constitutional law .
#Text=While cutting small biz property taxes by 50 % over 5 years .

#Text=In short , I am here to ensure that ignorant , incompetence , corruption are not tolerated in government and ensure political power is balanced by informed decision making - not simply fiscal myopia .
#Text=Please visit my website for a more detailed outline of my priorities at http://toronto2006.on.to .
